meanings.definition: Capable of being embraced or hugged.
meanings.sent1: The fluffy teddy bear was so embraceable that everyone wanted to hug it.
meanings.sent2: The soft pillow felt so embraceable as she hugged it tightly.
meanings.sent3: The embraceable puppy wiggled happily in her arms as she cuddled it.
meanings.sent4: The warm sunshine was as embraceable as a comforting hug on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The cozy blanket was incredibly embraceable, making her feel safe and warm.

meanings.definition: Able to be accepted or welcomed warmly.
meanings.sent1: Her kind words were so embraceable that they melted his heart.
meanings.sent2: The delicious homemade cookies were very embraceable at the party.
meanings.sent3: The embraceable invitation to the event made her smile with joy.
meanings.sent4: The sincere apology was as embraceable as a heartfelt hug.
meanings.sent5: The friendly gesture was incredibly embraceable, creating a sense of belonging.
